flavorText: Though the shaman rarely got what she wanted, she was never disappointed in the result.

foreignData.flavorText: Obwohl die Schamanin selten bekam, was sie wollte, war sie dennoch nie vom Ergebnis enttäuscht.
foreignData.name: Wilder Schwung
foreignData.text: Bestimme drei bleibende Karten deiner Wahl, die keine Verzauberungen sind. Bestimme eine davon zufällig und zerstöre sie.

foreignData.flavorText: Aunque el chamán pocas veces obtenía lo que quería, nunca estaba disconforme con el resultado.
foreignData.name: Golpe salvaje
foreignData.text: Elige tres permanentes objetivo que no sean encantamientos. Destruye uno de ellos al azar.

foreignData.flavorText: Si la shamane n'obtenait jamais ce qu'elle voulait, elle n'était cependant jamais déçue du résultat.
foreignData.name: Revers sauvage
foreignData.text: Choisissez trois permanents non-enchantement ciblés. Détruisez l'un d'eux au hasard.

foreignData.flavorText: Nonostante la sciamana ottenesse raramente ciò che desiderava, non fu mai delusa dal risultato.
foreignData.name: Colpo Selvaggio
foreignData.text: Scegli tre permanenti non incantesimo bersaglio. Distruggi uno di essi a caso.

foreignData.flavorText: シャーマンが自らが望むものを手に入れることは稀だが、その結果に落胆することはない。
foreignData.name: 大振り
foreignData.text: エンチャントでないパーマネント３つを対象とする。 それらのうち無作為に選んだ１つを破壊する。

foreignData.flavorText: Embora a xamã raramente obtivesse o que queria, nunca ficava decepcionada com o resultado.
foreignData.name: Varada Selvagem
foreignData.text: Escolha três permanentes alvo que não sejam encantamentos. Destrua uma delas aleatoriamente.

foreignData.flavorText: И хотя шаманка редко получала то, что хотела, она всегда оставалась довольна результатом.
foreignData.name: Бесшабашный Взмах
foreignData.text: Выберите три целевые перманента, не являющиеся чарами. Уничтожьте один из них, выбранный случайно.

foreignData.flavorText: 虽然祭师很少能得到预定的成果，但结果却总不会让她失望。
foreignData.name: 猛力挥击
foreignData.text: 选择三个目标非结界的永久物。 随机消灭其中一个。

name: Wild Swing
originalText: Choose three target nonenchantment permanents. Destroy one of them at random.

rulings.text: You target three permanents as you cast Wild Swing. You don’t randomly choose which one will be destroyed until Wild Swing resolves. If one of those permanents has become an illegal target by then, you randomly choose between the other two. If two of those permanents have become illegal targets by then, there is no random choice — the remaining permanent is destroyed.

As Wild Swing resolves, there is no time to react between the time a permanent is chosen at random and the time it’s destroyed. If you want to put a regeneration shield on one of those permanents, or sacrifice it for some effect, or anything else, you must do so before Wild Swing resolves (and before you know which one of the permanents will be chosen at random).

text: Choose three target nonenchantment permanents. Destroy one of them at random.
